item.title: 中国嘉实可能在四月晚些时候获得香港现货比特币 ETF 批准
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国资产管理公司嘉实基金管理有限公司（Harvest Fund Management Co.【原文：The international arm of Chinese asset manager Harvest Fund Management Co. may get approval from Hong Kong as soon as this month to launch a spot-Bitcoin exchange-traded fund, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行的法律挑战有可能使汽车金融调查复杂化
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）可能不得不延长其对汽车金融行为的长期调查，因为巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）对英国金融投诉消费者监察专员（Ombudsman for Consumer with Financial Complaints）的相关决定提出了法律挑战。【原文：The Financial Conduct Authority may have to extend its long-running probe into motor finance practices after Barclays Plc filed a legal challenge to a decision tied to the matter by the UK’s ombudsman for consumers with financial complaints.】

item.title: 华尔街认为财报推动股市继续反弹
item.description: 利率问题已经过去，是时候让企业盈利来推动股市破纪录的下一轮反弹了。【原文：Move over interest rates, it’s time for corporate earnings to fuel the next leg of the record-breaking stock market rally.】

item.title: 捷克财政部长称 "危机已结束"，前景有所改善
item.description: 捷克政府表示，由于企业投资和家庭支出增加，经济增长前景有所改善，经济有望从大流行病后两年的停滞状态中恢复过来。【原文：The Czech government said the economy was on track to recover from two years of post-pandemic stagnation as the growth outlook improved thanks to stronger corporate investments and household spending.】

item.title: 德国在华企业面临本地竞争对手的 "不公平 "竞争
item.description: 三分之二在华经营的德国企业表示，他们面临着不公平的市场竞争，这一问题可能会推高他们的成本，侵蚀利润空间。【原文：Two-thirds of German companies operating in China say they face unfair competition in the market, a problem that threatens to push up their costs and erode profit margins.】

item.title: 民调显示非国大支持率下降，祖马支持率上升，兰特暴跌
item.description: 一项新的民意调查显示，执政党非洲人国民大会（African National Congress）的支持率急剧下降，前总统雅各布-祖马（Jacob Zuma）支持的一个政党可能成为该国第三大党，兰特从今年的最佳水平下跌。【原文：The rand fell from its best levels this year after a new opinion poll showed support for the ruling African National Congress is plunging and a party backed by former President Jacob Zuma may become the country’s third-biggest.】

item.title: 中国管道巨头开发新的国家天然气价格指数
item.description: 中国的国有管道巨头正在努力创建中国自己的天然气价格指数，因为这个世界上最大的天然气进口国正在寻求对全球成本施加更大的影响。【原文：China’s state-owned pipeline giant is working to create the country’s own natural gas price index as the world’s biggest importer of the fuel seeks more influence on global costs.】

item.title: 经理人调查雪上加霜，中国万科跌至十年新低
item.description: 中国万科集团股份有限公司的股票和债券在下午的交易中扩大跌幅，该开发商称济南市的一位区域经理正在协助调查。【原文：Shares and bonds of China Vanke Co. extended declines in afternoon trading as the developer said a regional manager in the city of Jinan was assisting an investigation.】

item.title: 前外汇局局长称干预是日元过度疲软的一种选择
item.description: 日本前货币局局长表示，干预是解决日元过度疲软的选择之一，他在美国通胀数据公布前发表了这一讲话，美国通胀数据可能会推动日元突破市场参与者密切关注的水平。【原文：Japan’s former currency chief says intervention is among the options to address an excessively weak yen, speaking ahead of US inflation data that may nudge the yen past a level closely watched by market players.】

item.title: 欧洲投资银行支持西班牙 10 亿欧元风险投资基金
item.description: 欧洲投资银行（European Investment Bank）的风险投资部门将支持西班牙的一个新基金，该基金旨在向处于成长阶段的技术初创企业投资 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）。【原文：The European Investment Bank’s venture capital arm will back a new fund in Spain that aims to invest €1 billion ($1.1 billion) in growth stage technology startups.】

item.title: 风险持续存在，明年欧洲天然气价格上涨
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格走高，由于供应风险（包括来自俄罗斯的剩余气流）持续存在不确定性，预计明年冬季天然气价格将更加昂贵。【原文：European natural gas edged higher, with the fuel expected to be more expensive through next winter amid persistent uncertainty about supply risks, including remaining flows from Russia.】

item.title: 宝马电动车销量激增，竞争对手却在需求疲软中挣扎
item.description: 第一季度，宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）核心品牌全电动汽车的销量激增，为欧洲岌岌可危的电动汽车市场发出了积极信号。【原文：BMW AG’s sales of fully electric vehicles at its core brand surged in the first quarter, offering a positive signal in Europe’s faltering EV market.】

item.title: 欧盟启动补贴调查，中国清洁能源股票下跌
item.description: 周三，中国领先的风能和太阳能制造商股价下跌，原因是欧盟根据旨在保护欧盟生产商免受国家资助的外国竞争对手侵害的立法，宣布了两项单独的调查。【原文：Shares of China’s leading wind and solar manufacturers fell on Wednesday after the European Union announced two separate probes under legislation aimed at protecting the bloc’s producers from state-funded foreign rivals.】

item.title: 电池制造商瓦尔塔聘请罗斯柴尔德集团为债务谈判提供建议
item.description: 电池制造商瓦尔塔公司（Varta AG）正面临着另一次债务重组的前景，因为这家德国公司正在应对其关键微型电池市场的疲软，并从今年早些时候的网络攻击中恢复过来。【原文：Battery maker Varta AG is facing the prospect of another debt overhaul as the German firm deals with a softer market for its key micro batteries and recovers from a cyberattack earlier this year.】

item.title: Grifols 计划自卖空者高谭公司遇袭后首次出售债券
item.description: Grifols SA 正在寻求发行新债券，这将是该公司自 1 月份受到做空者攻击以来的首次债务交易。【原文：Grifols SA is seeking to issue a new bond, in what would be its first debt deal since coming under attack from a short seller in January.】

item.title: 捷克通胀接近目标为继续降息提供空间
item.description: 捷克 3 月份的通胀率仍保持在央行的目标水平上，这坚定了政策制定者继续降息的理由。【原文：Czech inflation remained at the central bank’s target in March, cementing arguments for policymakers to keep cutting interest rates.】

item.title: KKR 任命 Brody 领导美国和欧洲、中东和非洲地区的家族资本工作
item.description: 根据一份内部备忘录，KKR & Co.任命道格-布罗迪（Doug Brody）领导其在美国、欧洲、中东和非洲的家族资本业务，这家另类资产管理公司正加大力度开拓全球 13 万亿美元的单一家族办公室市场。【原文：KKR & Co. appointed Doug Brody to lead its family capital push in the US and Europe, Middle East and Africa as the alternative asset manager is scaling up efforts to tap the $13 trillion global single family office market, according to an internal memo.】

item.title: 泰国央行维持利率不变，加深与政府的裂痕
item.description: 泰国央行维持利率不变，拒绝屈服于总理沙威信（Srettha Thavisin）降低借贷成本的要求，表明在支持东南亚第二大经济体的方法上与政府的分歧越来越大。【原文：Thailand’s central bank left interest rates unchanged, refusing to yield to the demands of Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin to lower borrowing costs and signaling growing differences with the government over approaches to supporting Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 捷克武器生产商 CSG 去年销售额达 17 亿欧元，创历史新高
item.description: 武器生产商捷克斯洛伐克集团公司（Czechoslovak Group AS）报告称，由于乌克兰战争刺激了对该公司生产的重型弹药和战车的需求，该公司去年的销售额和利润率均创下历史新高。【原文：Arms producer Czechoslovak Group AS reported record sales and profitability for last year as the war in Ukraine boosts demand for heavy ammunition and combat vehicles produced by the Prague-based company.】

item.title: 津巴布韦 ZiG 第二天走强，对美元汇率上涨 0.2
item.description: 津巴布韦的黄金支持货币 ZiG 第二天走强，尽管该国的银行尚未完全转而使用新单位。【原文：Zimbabwe’s gold-backed currency, the ZiG, strengthened for a second day, even as the nation’s banks are yet to fully switch to using the new unit.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀放缓幅度超过预期
item.description: 挪威上个月的基本通胀率放缓幅度超过预期，这加剧了人们对挪威央行可能考虑在秋季前降息的猜测。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation slowed more than expected last month, fueling speculation that the central bank could consider an interest-rate cut before the autumn.】

item.title: 复星葡萄牙医院运营商将推进上市计划
item.description: 由中国复星国际有限公司（Fosun International Ltd.）最终控股的葡萄牙医院运营商 Luz Saude 计划进行葡萄牙三年来的首次公开募股。【原文：Luz Saude, the Portuguese hospital operator ultimately controlled by China’s Fosun International Ltd., plans to go ahead with what may be Portugal’s first initial public offering in three years.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数反弹逼近 8000 点大关
item.description: 2024年3月19日星期二，英国伦敦金融城，英国央行（BOE）左侧。投资者对英镑涨势的押注达到 17 年来最高水平，如果英国央行本周与其他国家一样发出降息信号，英镑将面临回调风险。摄影师：贝蒂-劳拉-萨帕塔/布鲁姆伯格【原文：The Bank of England (BOE), left, in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, March, 19, 2024. Investor bets on pound gains are at the highest level for 17 years, leaving the currency at risk of a pullback if the Bank of England joins peers in signaling rate cuts this week. Photographer: Betty Laura Zapata/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国水泥生产商在 15 分钟内暴跌 99% 后暂停交易
item.description: 周三，中国一家水泥生产商暂停股票交易，成为市场关注的焦点，在上一交易日的最后 15 分钟内，该公司股票遭到抛售，市值几乎损失殆尽。【原文：A Chinese cement producer was in the spotlight after it suspended stock trading Wednesday, following a selloff that nearly wiped out all its market value in the final 15 minutes of the previous session.】

item.title: 惠誉将中国债务稳步增长的前景展望降至负面
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司将中国长期外债的评级展望从 "稳定 "下调至 "负面"，理由是中国公共财政前景面临的风险不断增加。【原文：Fitch Ratings revised the outlook on China’s long-term foreign debt to negative from stable, citing increasing risks to the country’s public finance prospects.】

item.title: 3 月通胀数据将延长美联储降息时间的戏剧化进程
item.description: 周三将公布的消费者物价月度报告不太可能解决围绕美联储何时降息的争论，预测者预计，在年初通胀读数升高之后，物价将有所回落。【原文：A monthly report on consumer prices due Wednesday is unlikely to settle the debate around the timing of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, with forecasters expecting some moderation following elevated inflation readings at the start of the year.】

item.title: 国防股震荡引发对估值过高的担忧
item.description:
在欧洲领导人加强呼吁提高军费开支后，投资者今年仍坐拥300亿美元的收益。【原文：

Investors are still sitting on $30 billion of gains this year after European leaders stepped up calls to boost military spending.

】

item.title: 监管机构释放养老金现金，推动俄罗斯首次公开募股
item.description: 随着当局计划为养老基金投资小型交易开绿灯，俄罗斯首次公开募股（IPO）市场将加速复苏。【原文：The revival of Russia’s IPO market is set to accelerate as authorities plan to give pension funds the green light to invest in smaller deals.】
